description: This table contains free-text billing special needs.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the log record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: LOG_BILL_SPEC_TXT
columns.description: This item contains a description of potential special considerations for billing.
